name: Nikeba no Matsuri
description: An annual event held by Politeknik Negeri Bali. This year's Nikeba Matsuri #4 of Bali State Polytechnic with the theme "Haru no Kaze" which means "Spring Breeze." Just as the spirit, hard work, and creativity of the students will continue to bloom and inspire the lives of the community and the nation.

name: My Future Sunflower
description: As the seasonal flower blooms beautifully, born a girl that has an indescribable beauty...

name: Integer 2023 ~Jouhoukougaku no Sekai~
description: Jouhoukougaku no Sekai is the first cosplay event held on Information Technology Grand Celebration (Integer) series of events

name: The Japan Festival of Udayana 2023
description: In this year, D'JaFU 12th  introduces the theme '懐かしい記憶を刻む (Natsukashii Kioku o Kizamu)' and the sub-theme 'Feel the Rhapsody, Carve it in Your Memory'.  With a Japanese retro 80s atmosphere, D'JaFU 12th invites minasan to reminisce on the euphoria of Japan's rise and glory at that time.
